column4: nogimics - Unix systems were designed in the old days in academic and commercial places, like Bell Labs and MIT
nogimics - and when people like Stallman saw it was going to be commercialised they decided to make it free with GNU (GNU is Not Unix) with the same design principals, but different code
- linus only comes in using GPL in 1990-1 whereas Stallman is doing his stuff in the 80s, I start the story at Stallman.... not to say linus is unimportant, just that's where the story starts
